subject: Invoice for Google Maps Implementation 1
body:
Hello Zehlm Web Development, LLC,

Here is the invoice for the work you have recieved.

Summary

Attached to this email should be 1 invoice for 1 job (Google Maps Implementation 1): for a total of $70.00.

Specific Note

Thank you so much Michael. If there is a bug, I'll fix it. Should be fine, though.

Details


Google Maps Implementation 1: 1 invoice totaling $70.00


Invoice #1 for $70.00


As of the time of this mailing, your current outstanding balance is: $70.00



Thank You,
Web Apps Actualized

Do not reply to this email.

Replies to this email are not checked.
